ygData.subject: Re: Items you would like to see...
ygData.msgSnippet: Back in beta i asked a Brad while he was in the chat channel during a period of server down time if tinkeres would ever be able to make +ACI-Clockwork
ygData.messageBody:
Back in beta i asked a Brad while he was in the chat channel during a period of server down time if tinkeres would ever be able to make +ACI-Clockwork pets+ACI- because i had heard rumors.. but he said no, it would offset the balance to much... Imagin a wizard being able to have a pet at any time. Even if it was a weak pet....

Wes Lobdell,
Note: I'm not a Mac person, but you have to admit, the following is funny+ACEAIQ- :) And if you don't +ACI-get+ACI- it, then I guess the media hasn't soaked it for all its worth yet after all...
Quote: +ACI-Macintosh -- we might not get everything right, but
atleast we knew the century was going to end.+ACI-
-Woody Allen
------------------------
My all time favorite Oxymorons:
exact estimate, plastic silverware, genuine imitation, mud bath, original copy, student teacher, alone together, anarchy rules, bitter sweet, bankrupt millionaire, black light, butt-head, casual sex, clean dirt, coed sorority, cold as hell, computer jock, constant change, cowardly lion, curved line(according to the mathematical definition of a line), delibrate mistake, dry wine, earth angel(ok thats just going back a ways +ADs-), educational television, even odds, found missing, freezer burn, fresh cheese, full-length bikini, half full, half naked, hard water, hells angels, idiot savant, jumbo shrimp, less is more, and finally my all time
-----Original Message-----
From: Zach Heaven zheaven+AEA-yahoo.com
To: EQ+AF8-Tinkering+AEA-onelist.com EQ+AF8-Tinkering+AEA-onelist.com
Date: Wednesday, August 11, 1999 6:36 PM
Subject: Re: +AFs-EQ+AF8-Tinkering+AF0- Items you would like to see...


From: Zach Heaven zheaven+AEA-yahoo.com

Here is a revision that my friend and I were
discussing:

Practical --

1. augmented boots (ex: jboots)
2. fix cams
3. lightsource from inventory (ex: lightstone)
4. augmented armor (ex: thermal cloak)
5. infravision goggles (ex: heat sight)
6. clockwork pet (ex: elemental, Charlotte +AEA-
windmills)

Wishful Thinking --

1. dyeing armor colors (ex: black platemail)
2. flippers (ie: to augment swimming speed)
3. crossbow (give stuff to bower to do this)

Any additions? I separated it out into pratical
(stuff that exists in the game that tinkerers CAN
technically do already or should be able to) and
wishful thinking (stuff we WISH we could do).

-Kryogen Katspaw
